multiCatalogEnabled.title: Enable multi-catalog support
multiCatalogEnabled.disabled: There is no Shopify market defined, or your Shopify markets are managed by a third party

mappings.description1: For market-language pairs that have been indexed in Bloomreach, please fill in the corresponding Bloomreach Catalog names.
mappings.description2: Bloomreach will fallback to your default catalog if one is not specified for a matching market/language pair on the storefront.
